title: Go-url-shortener
content: Developed a REST API for url-shortener using Go language and Redis as a short time storage.

title: Gobank
content: Developed an authorized banking system REST API using Go language and JWT. Stored the data on MySQL. The code mimics a transfer, get account balance and get recent activity that is stored in the database

title: Golang-pipeline
content: CI-CD implementation using Go language, Github actions and deployed as Docker images.

title: Go-micro
content: Microservices implementation using Go language, RabbitMQ and gRPC.

title: Thermal Infrared Tracking System with YOLOv4 Algorithm and Visual Servoing Method
content: Low light person tracker using YOLOV4 tiny and Visual Servoing algorithm on a Single Board Computer (NVIDIA Jetson Nano).

title: CrimeLess
content: House security application to detect strangers in the house. ML App using Computer Vision, the Service run on cloud and sends notifications into the android application.

title: Medical Delivery Robot
content: Simulation of lane follower robot that can deliver medical needs using Webots software. Robot operated with the Python programming language.

title: Person Classification using CCTV Surveillance Video
content: A step by step explanation of Machine Learning part in CrimeLess Apps, part of Bangkit Academy capstone project
